Returns: content URI with which the content can be obtained.
an equivalent @B_android#support#v13#view#inputmethod#InputContentInfoCompat_E@ object, or null if not supported.
Parameters: Object: an android.view.inputmethod.InputContentInfo object, or null if none.
wrap(java.lang.Object).Description: Creates an instance from a framework android.view.inputmethod.InputContentInfo object. This method always returns null on API <= 24.

releasePermission().Description: Releases a temporary read-only access permission for content URI associated with this object. Does nothing if the temporary permission is not granted.

Returns: @B_android#content#ClipDescription_E@ object that contains the metadata of #getContentUri() such as MIME type(s). @B_android#content#ClipDescription#getLabel_E@ can be used for accessibility purpose.
an equivalent android.view.inputmethod.InputContentInfo object, or null if not supported.
unwrap().Description: Gets the underlying framework android.view.inputmethod.InputContentInfo object. This method always returns null on API <= 24.

Returns: an optional http or https URI that is related to this content.

requestPermission().Description: Requests a temporary read-only access permission for content URI associated with this object. Does nothing if the temporary permission is already granted.

ClassDesc: Helper for accessing features in InputContentInfo introduced after API level 13 in a backwards compatible fashion.
